analysis.title: ğŸ§  Offline Analysis
analysis.description: Analyzes stored videos locally and saves results in the analysis folder.

data_description.analysis_device: Compute target for analysis (Coral, iGPU, CPU)
data_description.analysis_frame_interval: Extract a frame every X seconds
data_description.analysis_face_enabled: Enables face detection and embedding extraction during analysis
data_description.analysis_face_confidence: Minimum confidence for face detection (lower = more faces, recommended: 0.2)
data_description.analysis_face_match_threshold: Threshold for face matching (lower = more matches, recommended: 0.35)
data_description.analysis_face_multiscale: Detects faces at multiple sizes (better for small faces, uses more CPU - disable on weak systems)
data_description.person_entities_enabled: Creates binary sensors for recognized persons (for automations)
data_description.analysis_auto_new: Analyzes new recordings immediately after saving
data_description.analysis_auto_interval_hours: Interval in hours (only for interval mode)
data_description.analysis_auto_since_days: Only recordings from the last X days
data_description.analysis_max_concurrent: Limits how many analyses can run at the same time (reduces CPU/IO spikes)

camera_config.title: ğŸ“¹ Configure {camera_name}
camera_config.description: Motion detection and recording settings for this camera.

data_description.motion_sensors: Binary sensor that starts recording (e.g. Trigger Sensors)
data_description.recording_duration: How long to record after motion (seconds)
data_description.snapshot_delay: Wait time before thumbnail creation for better images
data_description.rtsp_url: Custom RTSP URL instead of the one detected by Home Assistant (e.g. rtsp://user:pass@192.168.1.100:554/stream)
data_description.camera_retention: 0 = Use global setting. Otherwise: Hours for this camera
data_description.camera_objects: Empty = Global objects. Otherwise: Only analyze these objects
data_description.camera_detector_confidence: 0 = Global. Minimum confidence for object detection (0.1-0.9)
data_description.camera_face_confidence: 0 = Global. Minimum confidence for face detection (recommended: 0.2)
data_description.configure_another: Enable to configure another camera afterwards

manual_camera.title: ğŸ¥ Add Manual RTSP Camera
manual_camera.description: Add a camera that was not automatically detected by Home Assistant.

data_description.camera_name: Unique name for the camera (e.g. Garage, Driveway)
data_description.rtsp_url: RTSP stream URL of the camera (e.g. rtsp://user:pass@192.168.1.100:554/stream)
data_description.motion_sensors: Binary sensor that starts recording (e.g. Trigger Sensors)
data_description.recording_duration: How long to record after motion (seconds)
data_description.snapshot_delay: Wait time before thumbnail creation for better images
data_description.camera_retention: 0 = Use global setting. Otherwise: Hours for this camera
data_description.configure_another: Enable to add another camera afterwards
